description: The Supreme Court will hear arguments in a South Carolina case over whether states can cut off Medicaid funding to Planned Parenthood. Medicaid money generally can't be used for abortions, but the group is a key provider of other reproductive health services …

title: ICE admits to an 'administrative error' after Maryland man sent to El Salvador prison - ABC News
WATCH: Butch Wilmore and Suni Williams say they take some responsibility for Starliner issues in 1st news conference back on Earth - PBS
description: Both astronauts said they would strap into Starliner again. “Because we're going to rectify all the issues that we encountered. We're going to fix them. We're going to make it work,” Wilmore said, adding he'd go back up “in a heartbeat.”

title: Less Deep Sleep Linked to Brain Shrinkage, Alzheimer’s Risk - Neuroscience News
description: New research shows that reduced time in slow wave and REM sleep is associated with smaller brain volumes in regions vulnerable to Alzheimer’s disease.
